zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[短期承压，需关注支撑位]
zh.content:
当前以太坊(ETH)的价格为2818.79美元，较昨日下跌1.03%。从技术面来看，市场整体呈现出承压的态势，短期内可能面临进一步回调。近期高点2862.58美元未能有效突破，显示出买方力量不足，市场情绪偏向谨慎。

在技术指标方面，MACD当前值为-23.044834，表明市场动能偏弱，可能继续向下调整。虽然RSI(14)数据缺失，但结合当前价格走势，投资者应保持警惕，避免追高。在短期内，SMA(20)为2925.80，形成了明显的阻力位，进一步确认了市场的弱势。

支撑位方面，2806.26美元是近期低点，若价格跌破此位，可能会引发更大幅度的下跌，投资者需密切关注。若价格能够稳住在此支撑位上方，则可能出现反弹机会，建议短线交易者在此区间内寻求进场机会，同时设定止损以控制风险。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently trading at $2818.79, reflecting a slight decline of 1.03% over the past 24 hours. The recent price action shows a range between a high of $2862.58 and a low of $2806.26, indicating some consolidation around the $2800 level. This sideways movement suggests indecision among traders, and a decisive break below or above these levels could signal the next trend. The broader market sentiment appears cautious, which may impact Ethereum's ability to reclaim higher levels.

The absence of the RSI value makes it difficult to gauge the momentum, but the MACD reading of -23.044834 indicates bearish pressure. This negative momentum could attract sellers, especially if the price continues to test the lower boundary of the recent range. Meanwhile, the SMA(20) at $2925.80 serves as a critical resistance level that traders will need to overcome for a bullish outlook. A sustained move above this average could trigger a wave of buying interest, suggesting a potential reversal.

Support levels are currently identified around $2806, which coincides with the recent low. A breach below this level could expose further downside, potentially targeting $2700 as the next major support area. Conversely, if Ethereum manages to hold above this support, traders may look for a retest of the $2860 area as a short-term target. The established range offers a trading opportunity for those seeking to capitalize on price fluctuations.

Given the current market conditions, a cautious approach is advisable. Traders might consider setting buy orders near the support level of $2806 and sell orders around $2860. Additionally, keeping a close eye on volume and market sentiment will be essential, as these factors will likely influence the direction of Ethereum in the coming days. Risk management strategies should also be prioritized, especially in a market that is exhibiting signs of volatility.
